Text.Text: For you who wants to drain the swamp like a true roman.
More Drainage Channels can be connected to each Sluice Gate and reduces the running cost of the Sluice Gate.
A broader channel carries more water and fewer curses from the overseers.
With every gear we add, the sluice obeys our will a little more faithfully.
Each span of marsh we reclaim is another small victory for Roman stubbornness.
The accountants love any gate that drains water faster than it drains coin.
One day they will call this valley dry land and forget it was ever a swamp.
